did.abstract: Harry B. Benford was professor and chair of the department of naval architecture and marine engineering at the University of Michigan. The Benford collection includes professional correspondence and topical files relating to his work, teaching, and research.

repository.corpname: Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

acqinfo.p: The collection has been donated in multiple accessions from 1955 to 2014 by Harry B. Benford (Donor No. 3123)

accruals.p: Periodic additions to the records expected.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open except for departmental reviews memos (located in security vault) which require permission of the donor.

userestrict.p: Copyright has been transferred to the Regents of University of Michigan.

prefercite.p: [item], folder, box, Harry Benford papers, Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

bioghist.p: Harry B. Benford was born on August 7, 1917 in Schenectady, New York. After graduating from the University of Michigan in 1940, he worked at Newport News Shipbuilding Company for eight years before coming to the University of Michigan to teach in the Department of Naval Architecture and Marine Engineering. Professor Benford was chair of the department from 1967 to 1972. In addition, he also served as executive director of the National Academy of Sciences/National Research Council maritime research advisory committee from 1959 to 1960.

scopecontent.p: The Harry B. Benford Papers consists of correspondence and topical files relating to his work, teaching, and research.

scopecontent.p: The Correspondence series (8.2 linear feet, 1959-2014) consists of Benford's professional and personal correspondence from 1961 to 2014. Certain files in this series contain notes written by Benford giving background information on the correspondent or explaining the context of the folder's content.

odd.p: (includes brief memoir of relative's visit to Soviet Union)
(includes letter from 1939 written by Frank Benford (father of Harry Benford) to Leonard B. Clark)

scopecontent.p: The Topical Files series (6 linear feet, 1937-2009) dates from 1937 to 2009 and consists of sketches, drawings, correspondence, meeting notes, project proposals, accounts, contracts, research reports, lecture notes, personnel records, departmental review memos and miscellaneous notes. The series is divided into two subseries. One subseries is arranged by year and then by topic; the other subseries of topical files is arranged alphabetically. Some of the files in this series include notes by Benford of the event or explanation of the folder's content. Included in the topically arranged subseries are photos of Benford with various groups, chiefly at meetings of the Society of Naval Architects and Marine Engineers
